pages.cloud-account.list.allDebrid.expla: AllDebrid is an unrestricted downloader that allows you to quickly download files hosted on the internet
pages.cloud-account.list.easynews.explai: Easynews - Your Ultimate Internet Security and Usenet Solution
pages.cloud-account.list.premiumize.expl:
Premiumize.me is an unrestricted downloader (and more) that allows you to quickly download files hosted on the internet.

Moreover Premiumize let you test their service for free (you can play one file with a maximum filesize of 5 GB every 120 minutes)
pages.cloud-account.list.realDebrid.expl: RealDebrid is an unrestricted downloader that allows you to quickly download files hosted on the internet
pages.cloud-account.list.title: Debrid accounts
pages.cloud-account.list.torbox.explain: Torbox is a cloud-based torrent downloader and streaming service that allows you to quickly access and stream content
pages.providers.list.providerSimultaneou: Number of providers to run in parallel. 0 for unlimited. On some phones too many parallel providers can crash helios.
pages.providers.title: Providers
pages.settings.list.fileSizeFilter.maxSi: Max size (in GB) - Set to 0 to disable it
pages.settings.list.fileSizeFilter.packa: Filter won't apply on package source
pages.settings.list.playlist.item: Automatically seek for next episodes and create a playlist
pages.tuto.slide2.description: As said earlier, Helios relies on providers to find sources, so let's add some
pages.tuto.slide2.title: Add some providers
pages.tuto.slide3.description: Select the highest quality you want to play
pages.tuto.slide3.title: Choose quality
pages.tuto.slide4.description: If you want to play sources without any buffering issue, it's recommended to connect Helios to a debrid service
pages.tuto.slide4.title: Debrid Account
pages.tuto.slide5.description: Helios can play the source on different player, select your default player
pages.tuto.slide5.title: Where to play?
pages.tuto.slide6.description: You're all done, if you want to change these settings, go into Wako > Settings > Addons > Helios > Settings page
pages.tuto.slide6.title: All done
pages.tuto.slideDisclaimer.accept: I have read and agree with this
pages.tuto.slideDisclaimer.description:
Helios is a FREE and open-source third-party add-on developed by the community.
It is a source finder, it scrapes third-party sites (called providers) that you have to provide and are publicly available on the internet.
pages.tuto.slideDisclaimer.disclaimer:
Helios does not host, upload or manage any of the content on these sites and Heliosâ€™s add-on, staff and/or developers have no control over the content on these third party sites provided by the end user. Helios claims no responsibility for copyright, legality, accuracy, compliance, decency or any other aspect of the content displayed. It is positively the responsibility of the end user to avoid any actions that may constitute a violation of national, federal or terrestrial laws applicable to them.

Helios doesn't come with any providers, you have to add them manually.

Helios is not developed nor endorsed by wako, for support create issue on its github or discuss with the community on reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Addons4Wako/
pages.tuto.slideDisclaimer.title: About Helios
pages.tuto.title: Setup Wizard
